whatIs.title: What is Fixora?
whatIs.content: Fixora makes it easy to keep track of your properties in one place. Whether you own your home, a vacation property or a rental property, Fixora helps you organize everything you need to know about your properties—all accessible from your phone or computer.

why.title: Why Fixora Exists
why.content: It's harder than it should be to keep important property information organized. Documents end up in different folders, pictures are scattered across your phone, and it takes forever to find specifications when you need them. Fixora brings it all together so you can stop searching and start managing.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.content:
Keep Everything in One Place
Store all your property details—addresses, number of rooms, square footage, valuations—in one organized location. No more digging through files or hunting for documents.

Organize Your Documents
Photos, inspection reports, warranty brochures and contracts belong together. Upload them once, access them anytime. It's like having a digital filing cabinet that fits in your pocket.

See Your Properties on a Map
Visualize your properties with integrated mapping. Whether you're selling, renting or just keeping records, see everything at a glance.

Access Anytime, Anywhere
Use Fixora on your phone when you're on the go, or on your computer when you want a larger view. Your property information is always there when you need it.

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.content: Homeowners, property investors and anyone who wants to keep their property information organized and accessible. If you own property and want to stop managing files and start managing smarter, Fixora is for you.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.content:
We keep it simple. No complicated features you don't need. Just simple tools that help you organize your properties and find what you need instantly.

Available on iOS, Android and Web.

whatIs.title: What is Fixora?
whatIs.content: Fixora is a comprehensive property management platform designed for real estate agents, property managers and business owners. We simplify the way you manage, document and present your property portfolio with modern tools built for efficiency.

why.title: Why Fixora Exists
why.content: Managing multiple properties across different locations is complex. Spreadsheets become outdated, documents are spread across devices, and presenting properties to stakeholders takes too long. Fixora solves this by centralizing all your property information on one accessible, secure platform.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.content:
Centralized Property Management
Keep all property details in one place. Store addresses, specifications, valuations and documents without switching between multiple tools. Every team member stays synchronized with real-time updates.

Professional Documentation
Upload and organize property documents, certificates, inspection reports and contracts. Never lose important files again, and share them instantly with colleagues and clients.

Location Intelligence
Integrated mapping shows property locations with precise details. Present properties professionally to investors, lenders and partners with visual context that matters.

Built for Teams
Manage properties across your organization. Multiple users can access, update and collaborate on property portfolios based on their roles and permissions.

whoWeServe.title: Who We Serve
whoWeServe.content: Real estate brokerage offices, property management companies, investment firms and portfolio owners who need reliable tools to manage properties at scale.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.content:
We believe property management should be simple, not complicated. Fixora removes administrative friction so you can focus on what matters: growing your business and serving your customers better.

Available on iOS, Android and Web—work anywhere.
